title: Getting a patching error
body:
I've got this error while playing league, it says your servers are preventing me from patching, so I thought if I just restart league it would fix it, but now I can't log in and the error is constantly popping up, no matter how many times I get rid of it, I've also checked the server and it says everything is working fine, so like... what's going on?

The Error:
"Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching.
We're giving it another shot. In the meantime, you can check the status 
of our servers _here_ (error code 003)"

replies.body:
It seems like the server was indeed having issues around this time; however, the issue also seems to now be resolved.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=00110002,timestamp=2018-11-09T09:30:13.672+0000)
> 
> UPDATE 2: Engineers believe we may have resolved the issue and we've not seen any new reports of this problem come in for a while now. If you're still experiencing the 003 error or are stuck at patching/installing, please [lodge a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with player support if you've not done so already.

Same

UPDATE: another thread suggested to just spam restarting the client until it works. Came good for me after about 6-7 goes.
Same here, I don't know whats happening either
Same thing with me but i was able to log in but the play button is just grey and is unclickable
